inputEV.CIAttributeDescription: The amount to adjust the exposure of the image by. The larger the value, the brighter the exposure.

CIAttributeDescription: Adjusts the exposure setting for an image similar to the way you control exposure for a camera when you change the F-stop.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.
